description: Merino Sport 150 fabric helps with breathability, temperature regulation, and odor control through responsibly sourced Merino wool while offering the quicker dry times of polyester. their Men’s Merino Sport 150 go far. feel good.™ Spokes Short Sleeve tee is designed with a fit that gives you room to move, as well as thoughtful seam construction that helps minimize chafing and increases comfort. Whether you pop it on for a Saturday with the fam or for a workout in the park, you’ll get to enjoy this tee’s softness and comfort.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport 150 Go Far, Feel Good Spokes SS Graphic Tee - Mens
